tool_description: Collects comprehensive property information including ownership, assessments, physical characteristics, and current recorded uses from public records.

property_id.description: Property identifier (parcel number, address, or APN)

include_assessments.description: Whether to include tax assessment data

include_improvements.description: Whether to include building and improvement details

error_messages: Property not found: The specified property identifier does not match any records in the database.
Incomplete records: Some requested property data is not available or incomplete in public records.
Access restricted: Certain property information is restricted and cannot be accessed.
usage: Provide property_id and configure data inclusion flags as needed. This tool serves as the foundation for most compliance analysis workflows.
